subject: Gold Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, June 24 (AP) — Landon Donovan scored his 34th international goal, tying Eric Wynalda atop the United States career list, and Benny Feilhaber connected on a volley as the United States rallied for a 2-1 victory against Mexico on Sunday in the final of the Concacaf Gold Cup at Soldier Field.
